about_the_game:
Gaia is a story-driven platformer game, that takes you through Greek Mythology where you will face the Gods. How you will do this depends on you. Will you try to take them by force or use your brain to defeat them?

You play as Gaia, a young girl who is growing up in the Netherlands alongside her little brother Luca and her parents Stefany and Max. When Gaia is with her brother and father on a trip to Amsterdam, she wonders a little too far ahead while her father can't leave her little brother alone. This starts an epic adventure that you will never forget and will show the importance of being good to the environment.

Key features

  • Narrative design
  • Fully accessible
  • High-quality pixel-art that makes the world of the game come alive
  • Fight epic bosses, by using your brain or by force, you decide
  • Learn new skills along the way
  • Fully voice acted
  • Fully customizable controls
  • All controls supported (mouse, keyboard or controller)

Accessibility

Gaia is the first platformer game that will be fully accessible to blind and visually impaired players, as well as deaf or physically disabled players.
  • Fully narrated by voice actors or quality text-to-speech
  • Puzzles and fight adapted for blindness
  • Buttons to repeat the last voice speech and instructions.
  • Positional audio throughout the game, for atmosphere and as indications for enemies or interactable objects
  • No specific device required: play with keyboard or a controller.
  • Additional options: larger fonts and increased contrast (backgrounds and enemies.)
  • Adapted tutorials.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11 (64 bits)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 5000, Nvidia or ATI card with at least 1GB VRAM

short_description: A personal game about the maker's daughter with a link to our world's problems. Gaia is a story-driven platformer that takes the player through the world of Greek Mythology and leaves the player with the feeling that everyone can change the world for the better.
